question: You are attempting to launch a number of on-demand EC2 instances, but the launch operation fails with the InstanceLimitExceeded error. What does this error mean?

answers.A: AWS does not currently have enough on-demand capacity available to complete your request
answers.B: There is a region wide problem with EC2. Check the Personal Health Dashboard to see the status of the issue.
answers.C: You have exceeded the default limit for the number of instances you are allowed to launch in a single region. Contact AWS support to have your limit increased.
answers.D: You have selected an instance type which does not have sufficient capacity to run the operating system
